## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtSWAP70, SWAP70</u>
- **Gene Name:** 
- **Description:**   Pleckstrin homology (PH) domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_087428c]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Seedlings screened in bulk via high throughput methods for responses to various stressors. Results  are in comparison to Col-0.heat:no change,cold:no change,oxidative stress:decreased,osmotic stress:decreased,salt stress:no change,ABA:no change,hypoxia:no change.
